quoteFirst: The big guns of the battle cruisers began to pick up the range of the _Scharnhorst_ and _Gneisenau_ at
quoteLast: , three hours after the chase had begun, when the distance from the enemy’s armoured cruisers was some 18,000 yards, say ten land miles. And while the huge shots fly forth seeking their prey, let us visit in spirit for a few minutes the spotting top of the _Invincible_, and discover for ourselves how it is possible to serve great guns with any approach to accuracy, when both the pursuing and pursued ships are travelling at high speed upon different courses during which the range and direction are continually varying.
title:
The Silent Watchers
